data.title: Albert Einstein
data.meta_description: Full Name : Albert Einstein Born : March 14, 1879 Born Place : Ulm, in the Kingdom of Württemberg in the German Empire Died : April 18, 1955 Died Place : Princeton, New Jersey, United States. Albert Einstein Father : Albert Einstein’s father was Hermann Einstein.
data.text:

Full Name : Albert Einstein

Born : March 14, 1879

Born Place : Ulm, in the Kingdom of Württemberg in the German Empire

Died : April 18, 1955

Died Place : Princeton, New Jersey, United States.

Albert Einstein Father : Albert Einstein’s father was Hermann Einstein. Hermann Einstein was a salesman and engineer, born in 1847 in Buchau, Württemberg, in what is now Germany. He married Pauline Koch in 1876, and they had three children together, with Albert being their firstborn. Hermann Einstein was known for his keen interest in electrical engineering and was supportive of his son’s intellectual pursuits.

Albert Einstein Mother : Albert Einstein’s mother was Pauline Koch. She was born on February 8, 1858, in Cannstatt, Württemberg, in what is now Germany. Pauline Koch married Hermann Einstein in 1876, and they had three children together, with Albert being their firstborn. Pauline Koch was known for her nurturing and supportive nature, and she played a significant role in fostering Albert’s early intellectual development.

Albert Einstein Hometown : Albert Einstein’s hometown is often considered to be Ulm, Germany, where he was born. However, he spent much of his childhood and early life in Munich, where his family moved when he was a baby. While Ulm holds significance as his birthplace, Einstein’s formative years were primarily spent in Munich before he eventually left Germany and settled in various places throughout his life, including Switzerland and the United States.
